metadata.idinfo:
U.S. Environmental Protection Agency 20160802 Changes in Stream Water Temperatures in the Chesapeake Bay Region, 1960-2014 vector digital data
Washington, DC U.S. EPA Office of Air and Radiation (OAR) - Office of Atmospheric Programs (OAP)
https://geodata.epa.gov/arcgis/rest/services/OAR_OAP/StreamTemperature/MapServer https://www.epa.gov/climate-indicators
This map shows the changes in stream water temperatures in the Chesapeake Bay region from 1960 to 2014. Blue circles represent cooling trends in stream water temperatures, and red circles represent warming trends in stream water temperatures. Data were analyzed by Mike Kolian of EPA in partnership with John Jastram and Karen Rice of the U.S. Geological Survey. For more information: www.epa.gov/climatechange/science/indicators These data were created to be used for the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's Climate Change Indicators in the United States.
